name: It's Really Me
description:
IT'S REALLY ME!

The multiverse has ripped open and it's your first day on the job as a detective. Stop the imposters in their tracks by finding clues that don't match. A detective simulator with a twist. 

Test your perception in this clue finding, first person shooter game with high stakes and no rewards. You must determine who lives by surveying the evidence and sometimes making assumptions.

If there's a text pop up, right click to go to the next page.
Remember the debrief to the best of your ability.
And try not to shoot any REAL people.

Sensitivity can be changed in the Start Menu Settings.

DO NOT RIGHT CLICK TOO FAST CAUSES BROWSER REFRESH.
